summary: Comprehensive testing of Admin Panel for My Dammaiguda platform completed. Backend: 24/24 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All 8 tabs working, all CRUD dialogs functional.

issues: Tabs scroll horizontally on desktop (1920px), last tabs (Vouchers, Templates) partially visible until scrolled

critical_code_review_comments: All admin panel features implemented correctly and working
Point type system (normal, privilege, both) properly integrated in Shop
seed_data_creation: Test products, news, vouchers, templates created and deleted during backend tests. 6 products, 1 news article, 3 vouchers exist in DB.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin Panel fully tested. All 8 tabs working: Overview (stats, quick actions, issues by category), Users, Issues (status update), Education, Shop (products CRUD, orders, points adjustment), News (CRUD), Vouchers (CRUD with auto-generated codes), Templates (CRUD). Backend pytest file created at /app/backend/tests/test_admin_panel.py. OTP authentication MOCKED with static 123456.
